citation_details.title: Human response times are governed by dual anticipatory processes with distinct neural signatures
citation_details.author: AG Ramayya, V Buch, A Richardson, T Lucas
citation_details.abstract: Human behavior is strongly influenced by anticipation, but the underlying neural  mechanisms are poorly understood. We obtained intracranial electrocephalography (iEEG)
citation_details.short_author: AG Ramayya, V Buch, A Richardson, T Lucas
